title: Digital Art Workshop
summary: Express yourself through digital creative tools and techniques
description: Join our weekly digital art sessions where you'll learn illustration, graphic design, and digital painting. Work at your own pace with one-on-one support available. All skill levels welcome.

title: Mindful Gardening
summary: Connect with nature while learning sustainable growing practices
description: A sensory-friendly outdoor program where you'll tend community gardens, learn about plants, and practice mindfulness in nature. Quiet spaces available for breaks.

title: Coding for Beginners
summary: Build practical tech skills at your own pace
description: Learn web development fundamentals in a supportive, neurodivergent-friendly environment. Small group sessions with clear structure and predictable routine.

title: Board Game Social
summary: Low-pressure social connection through structured gameplay
description: Weekly board game sessions in a calm, predictable environment. Choose games that match your interests and energy level. No pressure to talk, just play.

title: Journaling Circle
summary: Guided reflection and personal exploration through writing
description: A quiet, structured space for personal reflection. Optional sharing in small groups. Prompts and materials provided. Come and go as needed.

title: Music Production Lab
summary: Create and mix music using professional software
description: Learn beat making, recording, and mixing in our soundproof studio. Headphones provided for comfortable individual work. Collaborate when ready.

title: Nature Photography Walks
summary: Explore local areas while developing photography skills
description: Gentle paced walks with photography instruction. Small groups, regular breaks, and flexible participation. Use your phone or borrow a camera.

title: Cooking Skills
summary: Build independence through practical meal preparation
description: Learn to prepare healthy, budget-friendly meals. Step-by-step guidance, sensory-friendly recipes, and small group sizes. Take home what you make.

title: Quiet Craft Corner
summary: Drop-in crafting with no social pressure
description: Open studio with various craft supplies. Work independently or alongside others. No instruction unless requested. A calm, parallel play environment.

title: Tech Support Training
summary: Learn to troubleshoot devices and help others
description: Develop valuable tech support skills. Structured learning path from basics to advanced. Work towards certification if interested.

title: Peer Support Meetup
summary: Connect with others navigating similar experiences
description: Facilitated peer support in a structured, predictable format. Share only what feels comfortable. Ground rules ensure safety and respect.

title: Innovation Lab Projects
summary: Work on real-world projects using emerging technology
description: Collaborate on meaningful projects using 3D printing, electronics, and coding. Flexible commitment levels. Build portfolio-worthy work.

title: Movement & Meditation
summary: Gentle movement practices for body and mind
description: Trauma-informed yoga, stretching, and meditation. No experience needed. Modify everything to your comfort. Sensory-friendly environment.

title: Community Garden Build
summary: Hands-on outdoor construction and design project
description: Help design and build new garden beds, paths, and structures. Learn carpentry and landscaping. Visible impact on community space.

title: Youth Leadership Group
summary: Develop advocacy and leadership skills with peers
description: For ages 16-25. Plan events, advocate for change, and develop leadership capacity. Structured meetings with clear roles and expectations.

title: Resume & Interview Skills
summary: Build confidence for job searching and interviews
description: Practice interviews in a low-pressure environment. Get feedback and develop strategies that work with your strengths. Build your resume.
